bsp.name: BSP Inspector
bsp.description: Shows metadata about a BSP file. Can be used to extract packed files.

mdl.name: MDL Inspector
mdl.description: Shows data about a MDL file. Can convert to GLTF and OBJ model formats.

wall.name: Wall Generator
wall.description: Generates walls with random tile placement.

vmt.name: VMT Editor
vmt.description: A node editor to edit VMT files.
